sentence: We found significant differences in survival for female sex (hazard ratio [HR] 0.67 95% CI 0.52–0.85, p = 0.026); robust, pre-frail, (HR 2.13, 95% CI, 1.56–2.92), and frail (HR 4.01, 95%CI 2.82–5.72, p < 0.001) status; disease type (p < 0.001) and widowed marital status (p = 0.001; Fig. 1).

We found significant differences in survival for female sex (hazard ratio [HR] 0.67 95% CI 0.52–0.85, p = 0.026); robust, pre-frail, (HR 2.13, 95% CI, 1.56–2.92), and frail (HR 4.01, 95%CI 2.82–5.72, p < 0.001) status; disease type (p < 0.001) and widowed marital status (p = 0.001; Fig. 1).

We found significant differences in survival for female sex (hazard ratio [HR] 0.67 95% CI 0.52–0.85, p = 0.026); robust, pre-frail, (HR 2.13, 95% CI, 1.56–2.92), and frail (HR 4.01, 95%CI 2.82–5.72, p < 0.001) status; disease type (p < 0.001) and widowed marital status (p = 0.001; Fig. 1).
